name: Lluna
details: Fuzz Drive & Voltage DropperThe LastGasp Art Laboratories Lluna is an overdrive/fuzz pedal that makes use of a built-in oscillator configuration and voltage dropper. The former provides a broad distortion level range while the latter generates a distortion sound whenever the power voltage drops. The pedal is capable of anything from soft overdriven characteristics to self-oscillating chaos. Proceed with caution.
